description: Dart source code defining MarketProvider class which manages market data, including fetching stock quotes via YahooFinanceService, polling for updates, and notifying listeners in a Flutter app.

classes.name: MarketProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages market data, including fetching quotes, alert management, and polling for updates.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches initial stock quotes from YahooFinanceService, falling back to mock data on failure.

methods.name: startPolling
methods.description: Starts periodic polling for stock quotes, with configurable interval.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Updates the loading state and notifies listeners.
